column5: I had a half day today at work so i decided to go fishing with my buddy... we left around 1230pm in toronto... and we got to our destination around 3pm... we where catching bass from one to another.. almost every cast we have bass... but nothing big as to take picture for my team 10... until I got this one... at first he didnt fight hard because I didnt felt it that he bite my bait... but when I reeled it back it felt heavy, then I set the hook... It was like a suprise because I couldnt see him, he went deep... but then he made two flips or jump I thought I was going to lose him... I have no net... anyway here is a crazy pic of myself and the fish     my biggest bass so far this 2011, he was 20"
nice fish and LOL at the steelheader hold too
I tried to be still but he hit me in the face lolz
that's what I guessed too! you should be using that pic for your avatar...
lolz that hurt you know... have you ever get a slap in the face with one of this cruel fish lolz I was horrified...
